name: Lost (itch) (Btdyaya)
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Arrowkeys- Movement
  • Z - Pick Up
  • X - Drop
  • C - Chop (You can only chop when holding the axe)

HOW TO PLAY:
- Drop wood onto the signal fire to alert a boat.
- Also drop wood into the pallet to sell it when the boat arrives.
- Manage carefully what you sell and what you burn.
